Hello! I am Riaz, a professional automobile engineer. I am in 10th class at Cox\'s Bazar Technical School and College. This is my portfolio apps. A friend of mine gifted me this app. My dream is to work as a principal engineer in Tesla company. To that end, I am reading my writing and developing skills.
